mapper.sql: id, LEARNER_ID, LEARNER_NAME, LEARNER_PHONE, LEARNER_SEX, LEARNER_AGE, LEARNER_IDCAR, COACH_ID, COACH_NAME, COURSE, APPOINTMENT_TIME, MOMENT, `TYPE`, `STATUS`, `READ`
mapper.select: select p.id, p.LEARNER_ID learnerId, p.COACH_ID coachId, p.COACH_NAME coachName, p.COURSE course, p.APPOINTMENT_TIME appointmentTime, p.MOMENT moment, p.TYPE type, p.`STATUS`status, p.`READ` `read`, i.LEARNER_NAME learnerName, i.LEARNER_SEX learnerSex, i.LEARNER_PHONE learnerPhone from dss_appointment_practice p JOIN dss_learner_info i on p.LEARNER_ID = i.ID WHERE p.TYPE = 1 order by p.APPOINTMENT_TIME desc

select p.id, p.LEARNER_ID learnerId, p.COACH_ID coachId, p.COACH_NAME coachName, p.COURSE course, p.APPOINTMENT_TIME appointmentTime, p.MOMENT moment, p.TYPE type, p.`STATUS`status, p.`READ` `read`, i.LEARNER_NAME learnerName, i.LEARNER_SEX learnerSex, i.LEARNER_PHONE learnerPhone from dss_appointment_practice p JOIN dss_learner_info i on p.LEARNER_ID = i.ID WHERE i.LEARNER_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') and p.TYPE = 1

select
from dss_appointment_practice where LEARNER_ID = #{learnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and `TYPE` = 1 order by APPOINTMENT_TIME desc
mapper.insert: insert into dss_appointment_practice (id, LEARNER_ID, LEARNER_NAME, LEARNER_PHONE, LEARNER_SEX, LEARNER_AGE, LEARNER_IDCAR, COACH_ID, COACH_NAME, COURSE, APPOINTMENT_TIME, MOMENT, TYPE, STATUS, READ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{learnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{learnerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{learnerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{learnerSex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{learnerAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{learnerIdcar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coachId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{coachName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{course,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{appointmentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{moment,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{read,jdbcType=TINYINT})

mapper.update:
update dss_appointment_practice
LEARNER_ID = #{learnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LEARNER_NAME = #{learnerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEARNER_PHONE = #{learnerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEARNER_SEX = #{learnerSex,jdbcType=TINYINT},
LEARNER_AGE = #{learnerAge,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LEARNER_IDCAR = #{learnerIdcar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COACH_ID = #{coachId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COACH_NAME = #{coachName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COURSE = #{course,jdbcType=TINYINT},
APPOINTMENT_TIME = #{appointmentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MOMENT = #{moment,jdbcType=TINYINT},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
READ = #{read,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dss_appointment_practice set LEARNER_ID = #{learnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LEARNER_NAME = #{learnerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEARNER_PHONE = #{learnerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEARNER_SEX = #{learnerSex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, LEARNER_AGE = #{learnerAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LEARNER_IDCAR = #{learnerIdcar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COACH_ID = #{coachName,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COACH_NAME = #{coachName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COURSE = #{course,jdbcType=TINYINT}, APPOINTMENT_TIME = #{appointmentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MOMENT = #{moment,jdbcType=TINYINT}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, READ = #{read,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
